attributes.action: Charge Immigrants for translator services when they cannot speak english
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is about time immigrants paid for their own translator ,as they cannot or will not learn english when the cost to the tax payer runs into millions of pounds for  the cost of translator services .We the tax payer demand value for money .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
